org.threadly.concurrent.collections

Interface ConsumerIterator<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - Parameter for types of item to be returned by next() and peek()

    public interface ConsumerIterator<E>

    Iterator which automatically consumes the queue as it is iterated over. The next() function has been replaced with remove() to consume items as it iterates over the structure.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasNext()
      Check if there are additional items to consume.
      E peek()
      Peek but don't remove the next item to be consumed, will return null if there is nothing left to consume in the queue.
      E remove()
      Removes and returns the next available item in the queue.

    • Method Detail

      • hasNext

        boolean hasNext()
        Check if there are additional items to consume.
        Returns:
        true if there is another item in the queue

      • peek

        E peek()
        Peek but don't remove the next item to be consumed, will return null if there is nothing left to consume in the queue.
        Returns:
        next available item

      • remove

        E remove()
        Removes and returns the next available item in the queue.
        Returns:
        next item with delay <= 0
